programme.title: You Are Too Much - EP 5
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) Through a twist of fate, the lives of a pop diva and her impersonator become intertwined, entangled in love, hatred, and compassion.

programme.title: Time Concert S4 - EP 1

Spanning 20 years, with time as the landing point, the top ten classic IP singers of music variety shows are invited, revisiting the 20 years of ups and downs of China's domestic music variety shows. The classic melodies are reinterpreted, and new musical connotations awakening the music memory of the music lovers.

programme.title: The Passbook - EP 2
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Thai) Bi An, the man who looks exactly like Bi De, brings him home to find out why they look so alike. Bi De thinks that he is at a movie set but reality soon sets in that he is in the year 1920. By chance, he meets the beautiful Wan Er again.

programme.title: The Passbook - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Thai) Bi De's aunt, Shi Li, and his good friend, Xiao Ping, are very worried by his sudden disappearance so they decided to make a police report. After hearing Bi An's name, Bi De realised that Bi An is his great grandfather, which explains why they look so much alike. Bi An does not believe him.

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 152

She knows virtually everything about the area, including where to climb the mountain. Kang Hyun-Jo is a rookie ranger at Jiri Mountain National Park. He graduated from the military academy and was once an army captain. He has a secret that he can't tell anyone about. These two people become partners and they work to save people around Jiri Mountain National Park.

programme.title: Flight to You - EP 24
programme.desc: The story follows an aspiring civil aviation pilot struggling to work with her cold and strict captain due to personality clashes. While experiencing several life-threatening aviation incidents, they learn to work together and grow to value each other.

programme.title: TOP COOKKU DUPU COOKKU - Season 2
programme.desc: Get ready for laughter and culinary chaos! 'Top Cooku Dupe Cooku' is a comedy cookery show where a celebrity top cook teams up with a chef and a dupe cook to execute a culinary challenge. Tune in for a hilarious dose of comedy, food, and fun!

programme.title: RAMAYANAM
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Annam
programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: AADUKALAM
programme.desc: Sathya loves her sister like a second mother & believes compassion outweighs all riches. But, Selvanayagi, a woman of pride & privilege, worships money & social status. When their worlds collide, what trials will Sathya face in her fight for justice?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: TOP COOKKU DUPU COOKKU - Season 2 Rpt
programme.desc: Get ready for laughter and culinary chaos! 'Top Cooku Dupe Cooku' is a comedy cookery show where a celebrity top cook teams up with a chef and a dupe cook to execute a culinary challenge. Tune in for a hilarious dose of comedy, food, and fun!

programme.title: Love In 40 Days
programme.desc: Jane gets into a car accident and ends up in Evergreen Mansion, a transitory place in the afterlife. She has to stay there for 40 days while waiting for a potential crossover to heaven. But Evergreen Mansion is in danger of being demolished because of businessman Edward's plans.

programme.title: Maalalaala Mo Kaya

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 4
programme.desc: Despite his grief Henri manages to keep going. Firstly with his son William, who's starting to worry him, and with his patients who need him. But Henri is still wary about revealing the identity of his patients, notably those he has doubts about, claiming a duty of professional secrecy.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes - EP 38
programme.desc: Journey to Bugey, discovering the land of Cerdon. This sparkling wine, white or rose, is made of fine bubbles and ancestral know-how unique to the region.

programme.title: Biquefarre
programme.desc: Forty years after ''Farrebique'', Georges Rouquier returns to visit his cousins, who are farmers in Aveyron. In the 1940s, he filmed their day-to-day lives. Since then, everything has changed: farming has become an industry, you have to expand and diversify to survive or die.
November 2030. It's 48°C in the classroom. Impossible to do any teaching.

programme.title: Sauvage
programme.desc: 2043. The Mediterranean Sea. Melissa, accompanied by her dog, works on the ''Rainbow'', her connected yacht. The young woman sells the plastic she collects to the global recycling exchange. One day she saves a little monkey from drowning. An encounter that changes her life.

programme.desc: Forests react to climate change and slowly adapt to it. Biologist Marie-Eve Roy and researcher Sylvain Delagrange look at the future of the sugar maple and document how it is adapting to global warming.

programme.desc: Viola Tami heads off to meet the owners of some of the sumptuous and surprising residences in Graubunden and Saint-Gall. In the heart of the canton of Zurich, she discovers that beauty and comfort can also rhyme with minimalist spaces, like tiny houses for example.

programme.title: 6h Info

programme.desc: Visually impaired individuals often encounter difficulties shopping, even online. Websites and stores are far too often poorly adapted to their condition. Also covered: antibiotics and farm animals; orange juice; ravioli for dessert.

programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. programme.title: Wilder - EP 3
programme.desc: Dani Räber isn't giving into Strunz's blackmail: the documents have no importance. Will the criminal fall into the trap? Suspected of murder, Zingg is set free but Kägi is watching him. Rosa Wilder hopes that her sick father will agree to undergo a treatment which could save his life.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 4
programme.desc: The party organised by the Räbers to celebrate the end of the dam project is overshadowed by a tragic accident. Kägi asks Rosa to help him with his investigation. Strunz, who needs money in a hurry, prepares a kidnapping.

programme.title: Hyuk Lee Au Palais-Royal
programme.desc: On the occasion of the 2023 European Heritage Days, the Palais-Royal in Paris became the setting for an exceptional recital by pianist Hyuk Lee. The South Korean artist performs works by Chopin, Debussy, Faure, and Elgar.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 6
programme.desc: A 4,000 square metre domus at the Vesunna Gallo-Roman Museum in Perigueux. Wendy Andreu structures each material with the same interest in creating unique objects. AlainPaul invites himself into a dance dressing room where clothes stretch and float. Jerome Clochard restores mosaics in Brittany.

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 4
programme.desc: From Damascus to the Parisian suburb of Seine-Saint-Denis, via Palestine, Beirut and Brittany, Maryam Samaan has been enriched by many cultures. After spending some years in Lebanon working with refugee children, the artist is now writing a chapter of her life in Paris.

programme.title: De Grandes Esperances
programme.desc: Madeleine and Antoine are an ambitious, politically committed couple. They are waiting for their ENA admission results. But on an isolated road in Corsica, a tragedy occurs that binds them together forever. Their relationship and their professional futures are turned upside down, hampered by this heavy secret.

programme.title: L'ete Des Chaleurs
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, a mother needs a break and a child needs to exist.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 21
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 49
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous ! - EP 22
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 53
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners - EP 6
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nui. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api ! - EP 9
programme.desc: Api and Koro return to the sports field to try to understand what happened to eric. They reconstruct the events and gather clues.

programme.title: Le Refuge D'audrey - EP 1
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 39
programme.desc: Whilst Vic wants to save trees, Sigis tries to replace Evelyne at home so that she can take part in a carpentry competition.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 10
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances - EP 10
programme.desc: August 1944. The village sees its last clashes against German troops. They finally flee. The time has come to settle scores between those who resisted and those who collaborated. Ernest and Colette are finally reunited with their parents.

programme.title: Matiere Grise
programme.desc: The magazine programme which takes the mystery out of science, encouraging us to think... without all the brain work!

programme.title: Louis Et La Faune Urbaine - EP 4
programme.desc: Louis discovers a family of racoons living inside the ceiling space of a house. The young are now over five weeks old and very aggressive.

programme.title: Le Beau Velo De Ravel
programme.desc: A bike journey, presented by Adrien Joveneau, along the entire RAVeL network, an independent cycle path network in Wallonia. With each programme, the presenter tells us of a stage in his journey and talks about mobility and tourist resources in the region.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera - EP 53
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 5
programme.desc: After growing up in a favela and discovering the flute by chance, Eduardo Rosa is now flutist at the National Music Conservatory of Paris. After ten years in the capital, this Brazilian divides his time between concerts and his pupils, to whom he passes on the love of music.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match - EP 50
programme.desc: He is the first Monegasque to win the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters: Romain Arneodo, winner of the men's doubles at the 2025 event, looks back on his career.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada

programme.title: Magazine

programme.desc: Serge meets Quebec actress and director Monia Chokri and Franco-Quebec singer and actor Aliocha Schneider. We then follow him to the Paris suburbs, as he holds the final auditions for his next project, the show ''La Haine''.

programme.title: Green - EP 3
programme.desc: Antoine Auriol discovers the Pacific island of Tahiti. Accompanied by the wildlife rangers dedicated to protecting the island and its lagoon, he enjoys an immersion in Tahitian culture, closely linked to its natural ecosystem. Jessica, Dominique, Cindy, Patrick, Richard, Cecile, Matahi and Lea recount this intimate connection.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 10
programme.desc: Africa Fashion Up, exploring the world of African fashion. A wardrobe-essential everyone wears, the very French story of jeans. In addition to creating the Palme d'Or, the haute joaillerie house Chopard has launched a special jewellery collection for the Cannes Film Festival. Popular and urban: wearing a bomber jacket.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 7
programme.desc: The Musee des Beaux-Arts du Perigord offers a rich and varied selection of works. In his studio, Tuan Tran combines the finesse of glass with the brutality of concrete. At Schiaparelli, masculine and feminine are confidently combined. Dive behind the scenes of D'Offard wallpaper production.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The programme that (finally) explains the ins and outs of Swiss well-being, and offers the keys to understanding that renowned ''Swiss attitude. programme.title: Movie - Chatriya Vamsam

programme.title: Movie - Nilaa Kaalam
programme.desc: Nila's mother, an actress, is separated from her husband. Nila has all the comforts but no friends. She befriends two boys who work in a garage. They plan a picnic that may change everything forever.

programme.title: Movie - Nimidangal

programme.title: Movie - Chinna Vathiyar
programme.desc: A scientist gets into trouble when he develops a formula that enables the soul to move out of a body and enter a person or animal present in close proximity.

programme.title: Movie - Thenkasi Pattinam

programme.title: Movie - Thiruvilayadal Arambam
programme.desc: Guru hatches several plans to separate Priya and her lover Thirukumaran. However, each time Thirukumaran successfully manages to escape from Guru's evil plans and traps him in another problem.

programme.title: Movie - Neram

programme.title: TotalEnergies BWF World C'ships 2025 (Live)
programme.desc: The BWF World Championships is the most prestigious badminton competition, offering the most ranking points. The winners of the tournament are World Champions of the sport and are awarded a gold medal. The tournament started in 1977. Starting 2006, the tournament was changed to an annual event on the BWF calendar. The tournament is not held during the Summer Olympics years to avoid schedule conflicts.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025: (Zhao Xintong vs Mark Williams)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 2
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: REVIEW - MON 25 AUG
programme.desc: Review brings highlights of Matchweek 2, including Friday's opening game with West Ham hosting Chelsea, Spurs travel up to Man City, and Monday's finisher with Newcastle taking on the title holders Liverpool.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 3
programme.desc: Born in Lodi, raised in Brescia and Milan, home now on Tyneside, Sandro Tonali has established himself as an influential part of Eddie Howe's Newcastle side since his statement transfer from boyhood club AC Milan in 2023. In this week's Big Interview, the Toon's number eight reflects on his triumphs and tribulations, including helping the Rossoneri to a first Scudetto in 11 years and adapting to life on and off the pitch in the North-East of England.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 13
programme.desc: We catch up with Christian Benteke in Washington, where the powerful Belgian striker now leads the line for D.C. United. From his early days in Belgium to his explosive arrival in the Premier League with Aston Villa, followed by big moves to Liverpool and Crystal Palace, Benteke's journey has been one of raw talent, resilience, and reinvention.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 17
programme.desc: Liverpool and Spain star Luis Garcia selects his ultimate Premier League eleven, choosing from the best players he played alongside in England. Drawing on his experiences at Anfield and on the international stage, Garcia reflects on the talent, skill, and personalities that made his list. With insight, anecdotes and tough decisions, he builds his dream team from his unforgettable years in the Premier League.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - EP 2
programme.desc: Fast-paced with music, ISO angles, and commentary, Netbusters offers an alternative review of every goal and key moment from the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 2
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: From his early days in Finland to lifting the Champions League trophy in 2005, we chart Sami Hyypiä's journey to the top of English football. We join him for a snowmobiling adventure across the icy wilderness of Finland and though interviews and personal moments, showcase not only his leadership and skill on the pitch but also his deep connection to his roots.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 3
programme.desc: Born in Lodi, raised in Brescia and Milan, home now on Tyneside, Sandro Tonali has established himself as an influential part of Eddie Howe’s Newcastle side since his statement transfer from boyhood club AC Milan in 2023. In this week’s Big Interview, the Toon’s number eight reflects on his triumphs and tribulations, including helping the Rossoneri to a first Scudetto in 11 years and adapting to life on and off the pitch in the North-East of England.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 13
programme.desc: We catch up with Christian Benteke in Washington, where the powerful Belgian striker now leads the line for D.C. United. programme.title: MEGA Fights Andre Ward vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features light heavyweights Andre 'S.O.G.' Ward (25-0, 13 KOs) vs. Chad Dawson (31-1, 17 KOs) in a championship contest from the Oracle Arena in Oakland, California, USA, on September 8, 2012. A paid attendance of 7,611 brought in a gate of $706,469 and 1.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Thirty finalists return to Dallas with a chance to land one of 15 spots in Las Vegas. In addition to the qualifying round's 6 obstacles, athletes must tackle 4 additional challenges--including the all-new Swinging Frames!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. David Estrada
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a bout to determine a new NABF welterweight champion, as Andre Berto faces David Estrada. Also on the card, kickboxing legends Errol Zimmerman and Daniel Ghita battle to a gruesome end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3 from Tokyo, Japan at the Ryogoku Kokugikan, features Takayasu, Terunofuji, Meisei and Takakeisho.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Heath Todd
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (61-3-1 29 KO) vs. Heath Todd (32-10-0 13 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from the War Memorial Auditorium in Ft. Lauderdale FL USA.

programme.title: WCCB Ricardo Malajika vs. Jackson Chauke
programme.desc: From the Emperor's Palace in Johannesburg, it will be Champion vs. Champion when IBO Super Flyweight World titleholder Ricardo 'The Magic Man' Malajika will go down in weight to take on current IBO Flyweight World Champion Jackson Chauke with hopes of capturing the crown in his second weight class. Malajika has been victorious in three straight World Title contests and now takes on Chauke who claimed the vacant championship with a decision win at York Hall in the UK just over a year ago.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Andy Lee vs. Craig McEwan
programme.desc: This episode features the 24-1 Andy Lee facing off with the 19-0 Craig McEwan, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman taking on Carlos Quintana. Also on the card, kickboxing super heavyweight legend Daniel Ghita faces off against Brice Guidon.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Stanley and the children tour the museum and quickly realise there's nothing about them or their friends, so they make a new exhibit all about their town today!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Myrtle's aunt Cressy is coming to stay, and she needs Stanley to make her a bed for her. This escalates into Stanley building her a whole set of rooms outside Myrtles actual house.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Stanley cleans Cynthia's bus, but each time he does it keeps getting dirty again. It's so dirty by the end, he invents a super-duper cleaning machine that makes a sea of bubbles.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Stanley, Sophie and Benjamin make up a new game, 'Dino-Pirates'. This is such a good game, they use it as inspiration for Stanley's carnival float.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Stanley must keep Myrtle's pumpkin safe from Speedy the snail. He builds a series of obstacles and defences to protect it from the tenacious Speedy who tests Stanley's ingenuity.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Morris and Pearl have lost one of their medals in the canal. Stanley fishes it out only have the complete collection dropped in. Stanley dons a diver's suit and goes after them.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Stanley must track down the missing library book, 'The Little Book of New Things to Do'. He visits various townsfolk who have leant the book to each other.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Stanley must deliver some parcels on the train but ends up delivering the wrong ones. After correcting his mistake, he has to muster the townsfolk to help stop his runaway train.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Stanley must teach his friends how to knit. They all knit so much they burst out the top of the community centre. Stanley repairs the roof with the groups knitting.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Myrtle wants everyone to see her new dance so enlists Stanley to gather some friends. However, the stereo breaks so they have to make their own music.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Cynthia asks Stanley to teach her to fly an aeroplane for Fifi's birthday. Stanley constructs a flight simulator and has the help of their friends to put her through her paces.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Stanley covers Jose at the shop and ends up making too much popcorn. So as not to waste it all, Stanley and his friends put on a film night to screen Little Woo's film.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Amare asks Stanley to help her on the farm. Stanley asks Little Woo, Fred and Fifi to join him in sowing seeds, watering plants and picking apples, all whilst having fun.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Stanley helps Fifi and Fred dig up some shiny stones in their garden that turn out to be old bits of mosaic. With the help of Cynthia and Hettie, they put the pieces back together.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: Seamus has booked the wrong date for his and Little Woo's holiday. Stanley repurposes the locations of the town into activities and sights to give them a holiday in a day.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Stanley has to fix Myrtles wobbly sofa so her and her friends can watch Fred and Fifi on the Boogie Woogie Dance Show together. He ends up creating a super-duper special sofa.

programme.desc: Stanley must deliver some parcels on the train but ends up delivering the wrong ones. After correcting his mistake, he has to muster the townsfolk to help stop his runaway train.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Stanley must teach his friends how to knit. They all knit so much they burst out the top of the community centre. Stanley repairs the roof with the groups knitting.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Myrtle wants everyone to see her new dance so enlists Stanley to gather some friends. However, the stereo breaks so they have to make their own music.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 11

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 12

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 15

When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

Their distress grows upon discovering that this "Qilin" isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again.

Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 53
programme.desc: Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 1

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 2

programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 - EP 1

programme.desc: Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot "Qilin" and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season_x000D_1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert - but magical - chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: U.s. Markets Edition 2025
programme.desc: U.S. Markets Edition delivers key takeaways from the most impactful interviews and insights from CNBC’s programming in the US. As global markets become more interconnected, this program ensures audiences in Asia stay informed on major developments shaping the business world overnight.

programme.title: Inside India

programme.title: Access Middle East
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe
programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange

programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Americas Now
programme.desc: Americas Now profiles the development, diversity and challenges facing the Americas, particularly Latin America. The strength of the program is its storytelling. Correspondents across the region present insightful, well-researched and engaging narratives. Americas Now is a compelling, authoritative and balanced voice from the region, giving CGTN a competitive edge in the North American media market.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: Travelogue

programme.title: Global Watch

programme.desc: Unruly Catfish: Japan is seismically active - the Edo period was no exception. In the aftermath of a major earthquake, an angry guardian deity set off on a quest to capture those deemed responsible.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: While immune checkpoint inhibitors can improve cancer survival rates, they only work in about 20 to 30 per cent of patients - we interview Japanese researchers trying to overcome this challenge.

programme.title: Trailblazers
programme.desc: Artist Suzuki Mai works to promote kumiko, a traditional craft in which small wooden pieces are joined together without the use of nails - We examine how she is interlocking tradition and technology.

programme.title: Kangsi Coming

programme.title: Xiaomai's Health Notes

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Deep in the Realm of Conscience - EP 1
programme.desc: Set during the Tang dynasty, drama follows Prince of Ping, Princess Taiping, and their confidants as they vie for control of the imperial court, exposing layers of jealousy, betrayal and ambition amid the backdrop of court intrigue.

programme.title: Heavenly Hand & What's On Today - EP 24
programme.desc: The owner of Tai Lung Fung Mahjong Parlor witnesses the changing of the times, along with his group of neighbourhood friends in Wan Chai. His peaceful life is disrupted by a girl who has the same habits as him, and a USB of unknown origin.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2630
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Serendipity - EP 11
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Happily Ever After? - EP 1
programme.desc: This drama tells various entanglements of romantic relationships - violence and tenderness; ugliness and beauty; sadism and healing; reality and romance. Through four parts, the drama explores situations and questions that many have experienced.

programme.title: Golden City - EP 699
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2026
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Serendipity - EP 12
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 24
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship until they parted ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: The Prisoner of Beauty - EP 35
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2027
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentleman - EP 51
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: The Long River - EP 16
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: The Ingenious One - EP 10
programme.desc: In the process of traversing the rivers and lakes after ten years of training, Yun Xiang (Chen Xiao) met Shu Yanan (Rachel Momo), a weird and intelligent woman and several others and gradually realized the warmth of friendship.

programme.title: Mental Coach Jegal - EP 10
programme.desc: A former Taekwondo athlete, who is permanently banned from the national team, becomes a mental coach to help players in slump, heal retired athletes and engage a real match against the absurd world of winner-take-all.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 8
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Their Wonderful Time - EP 8
programme.desc: When female game designer Song Ling Ling (Zhou Jie Qiong) unexpectedly becomes possessed by the NPC she had created, she finds herself in a comical cohabitation with 'the client', Xiao Ran (Ge Qiu Gu).

programme.title: Their Wonderful Time - EP 9
programme.desc: When female game designer Song Ling Ling (Zhou Jie Qiong) unexpectedly becomes possessed by the NPC she had created, she finds herself in a comical cohabitation with 'the client', Xiao Ran (Ge Qiu Gu).

programme.desc: When female game designer Song Ling Ling (Zhou Jie Qiong) unexpectedly becomes possessed by the NPC she had created, she finds herself in a comical cohabitation with 'the client', Xiao Ran (Ge Qiu Gu).

programme.title: The Tale of Lady Ok - EP 11
programme.desc: The story follows legal expert Ok Tae Young (Im Ji Yeon) during the Joseon period whose name, identity, and husband are all fabricated. Entangled in a fierce survival scheme, entertainer Cheon Seung Hwi (Choo Young Woo) is willing to risk his life for her.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 9
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Road To Eternity - EP 4
programme.desc: The Envoy of Wisdom sympathised with mankind in their affliction, he swore to save all living beings before becoming a Buddha. He had transmigration of his soul into human being and named as HUI TAK (Lam Ka Tung)._x000D__x000D_TAK was very clever but aloof from fame and wealth. He admired a famous doctor’s granddaughter FUNG (Chan Miu Ying) and they were intimate to each other. On the other hand, PRINCESS MAN SHUI (Tong Ying Ying) liked TAK very much because of his intelligence.

programme.title: Angels of Missio - EP 13
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 14
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Kung Fu Master From Guangdong - EP 19
programme.desc: The tale aims at revealing the Kung fu Master WONG KI YING’s life and his righteous character. YING and his colleagues are respected as the "Ten Tigers of Guangdong". The tale is played by Wong Yat Wa, Felix, Leung Tsang, Jay, Lau Kam Ling, Kwok Jing Hung and Kung Fu Masters from the Mainland China. The tale is shot at Yunan Kunming. Audiences will be astonished by the stylish fighting and special landscapes. One will be deeply impressed by it.

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 11
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 15
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Kung Fu Master From Guangdong - EP 20
programme.desc: The tale aims at revealing the Kung fu Master WONG KI YING’s life and his righteous character. YING and his colleagues are respected as the "Ten Tigers of Guangdong". The tale is played by Wong Yat Wa, Felix, Leung Tsang, Jay, Lau Kam Ling, Kwok Jing Hung and Kung Fu Masters from the Mainland China. The tale is shot at Yunan Kunming. Audiences will be astonished by the stylish fighting and special landscapes. One will be deeply impressed by it.

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 13
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 14
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Eternity - EP 4
programme.desc: Stunt man Fung (Alex Fong) and Inspector Yeung were good friends and they were wooing the same girl, Wai (Jessica Hester Hsuan). Wai chosed Fung and they went on a holiday in Xi’an. There, Fung met a girl named Hung (Faye Wong), whom he had faint memory of her saving him twenty years ago. Yet he was astonished as Hung looked the same without aging a bit. Since then, his mind was preoccupied with Hung.

programme.title: To Grow With Love - EP 18
programme.desc: Filipino-born Chinese HO MEI-TIN (WU, MYOLIE) has been slightly overweight since childhood. She is constantly teased about her chubby frame while in Hong Kong, where it is widely recognized that thinness is the essence of beauty. Feeling so frustrated and annoyed, TIN decides to move back to the Philippines. However, when she notices the comments left in her drawing in response to her views on love, she soon has a change of heart and chooses to stay and look for the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Airport Strikers - EP 18
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. The quartet manage to survive drillmaster Man Wing-keung’s (Eddie Kwan) boot camp and become ASU officers after graduation. King-san and ASU CIP Cheung Chun-hak (Hugo Wong) just keep antagonizing each other.

programme.title: Airport Strikers - EP 19
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. The quartet manage to survive drillmaster Man Wing-keung’s (Eddie Kwan) boot camp and become ASU officers after graduation. King-san and ASU CIP Cheung Chun-hak (Hugo Wong) just keep antagonizing each other.

programme.title: Wax and Wane - EP 13
programme.desc: YUNG SHING-FUN (Lau Siu Ming) and his cousin MAN WING-CHEONG (Chow Chung) have been at odds for years over the trade name right of a noodle shop. YUNG YI-TSUN (Kwok Tsun On), FUN’s eldest son, is engaging in a property developing project. Not entirely willingly, he offers to buy out the location of CHEONG’s noodle shop with his company’s shares. He also invites CHEONG and his son, MAN KA-FUNG (Chan Kam Hung), to join the company’s management.

programme.title: Wax and Wane - EP 14
programme.desc: YUNG SHING-FUN (Lau Siu Ming) and his cousin MAN WING-CHEONG (Chow Chung) have been at odds for years over the trade name right of a noodle shop. YUNG YI-TSUN (Kwok Tsun On), FUN’s eldest son, is engaging in a property developing project. Not entirely willingly, he offers to buy out the location of CHEONG’s noodle shop with his company’s shares. He also invites CHEONG and his son, MAN KA-FUNG (Chan Kam Hung), to join the company’s management.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the baby's life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three 'Rob-B-Hood' must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to "Casino Tycoon". 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down...

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Miss Du Shi Niang
programme.desc: A famous prostitute Du Shi Niang has always hoped to find her true love in the brothel. Eventually, she meets a handsome student Li Jia and they fall in love at first sight. However, Du Shi Niang is suspicious of him and uses all means to test his love, not knowing that some people are just unable to stand up to the test...

programme.title: Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK is a serial liar who constantly bends the truth to get his way. One day, he meets his dream girl, Wonderful and pretends to be a rich man in order to win her heart. However, Wonderful has sworn that she will never love a man who lies. Can OK stop lying and win his dream girl's heart?

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn's beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong's concubine as he knows Dong's adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fiance, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong's hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family's young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo's stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hong escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hong for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hong escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return...

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate's daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master "Shadow Whip", he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to "Shadow Whip"?

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money!_x000D_Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.
